titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate on the need to commend Clifford Hugh Frame for his leadership and achievement in the operation of the Cyprus Anvil Mine.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.
Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.

bill.summary: 6/10/1988--Introduced. Commends Clifford Hugh Frame for his leadership and achievement in the operation of the Cyprus Anvil Mine, Canada.
